definition: the quality of being easy in behavior or style
details:
noun
- the quality of being easy in behavior or style
= example: the quality of being easy in behavior or style
- freedom from difficulty or hardship or effort
= synonyms: ease
- a feeling of refreshing tranquility and an absence of tension or worry
= example: a feeling of refreshing tranquility and an absence of tension or worry
= synonyms: relaxation
